##### Means

```{r}
for (species_input in protist_species){
  
  response_variable = paste0(species_input, "_indiv_per_ml")
  
  print(plot.patches.points(ds_patches, patch_type_input,
                              response_variable))
  
}
```

##### Boxplots

```{r}
for (species_input in protist_species) {
  
  response_variable = paste0(species_input, "_indiv_per_ml")
  
  print(plot.patches.boxplots(patch_type_input,
                              response_variable))
  
}
```

##### ES

```{r}
for (species_input in protist_species){
  
  response_variable = paste0(species_input, "_indiv_per_ml", "_d")
  
  print(plot.patches.points.ES(ds_patches_effect_size, patch_type_input,
                               response_variable))
  
}
```
